title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki

vmassol - (10:28): mflorea: could be interesting for us no? http://www.ongwt.com/post/2010/01/27/GWT-Validation-Framework-based-on-the-JSR303  
plunden joined #xwiki at 10:28  
vmassol - (10:29): (we're using JSR303 on the server side already in our xwiki-properties module AFAIK)  
vmassol - (10:29): (thomas would know more than me on this)  
tmortagne - (10:30): vmassol: yes we are using hibernate-validator implementation  
mflorea - (10:30): vmassol: reading  
tmortagne - (10:30): (well xwiki-properties use it but none of the macros are using it yet)  
npm left at 10:30 (Quit: Leaving.  
tmortagne - (10:31): (mostly waiting for http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/Propertiesdisplayers : a way to make WYSIWYG know the constraints)  
tmortagne - (10:32): but indeed we would directly give JSR303 descriptor maybe if there is implementation for GWT  
SvenDowiu joined #xwiki at 10:33  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 10:33  
SvenDowideit left at 10:36 (Ping timeout: 272 seconds  
SvenDowiu is now known as SvenDowideit ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
npm joined #xwiki at 10:37  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 10:44  
mflorea - (10:46): tmortagne: passing the JSR303 descriptors directly to GWT would be nice but I think we would still need to have the sources for macro parameter and the custom displayers in the classpath during GWT compilation.  
tmortagne - (10:47): mflorea: sure there is more that just the constraints  
jvelo - (11:05): tmortagne, hi  
jvelo - (11:05): you 2.2RC1 release is this morning ?  
jvelo - (11:05): s/you//  
tmortagne - (11:06): jvelo: hi, not this morning no (and not today i think), i doubt anyone is really ready (i'm not, i did not even had time to look at hudson state)  
jvelo - (11:06): okay  
jvelo - (11:06): thanks

tmortagne - (12:00): mflorea: there is one WYIWYG test failing on hudson http://hudson.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-product-enterprise-tests/com.xpn.xwiki.products$xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/459/testReport/  
mflorea - (12:01): tmortagne: that is because platform/web is not built http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/Platform/job/xwiki-platform-web/  
tmortagne - (12:02): you mean that there is a fix in the last web ?  
mflorea - (12:02): yes, the failing test proves the fix  
tmortagne - (12:02): ok  
tmortagne - (12:03): (i'm working on web issue on hudson)  
tmortagne - (12:04): ha yes svn is down so it will not work now...  
mflorea - (12:04): Hudson had some issue over the weekend because the svn certificate expired  
tmortagne - (12:05): yes it can't even access it right now  
tmortagne - (12:06): btw i dont see why hudson use https since it doe snot committ anything, i guess the link is wrong in the configuration i will change it  
tmortagne - (12:07): it seems it was only on web

maggolo - (13:54): Hi all, last time here is far away but I'm back ;-) Yes and you know it, i have a problem, let me describe it: I have XEM 1.7.1.21800 because i have no time for update since this version, and there are links to IT.OS/Druckereinrichtung, now slashes in such links are evil because in the browser adress list i got such a link http://name.domain.de:8080/xwiki/bin/view/IT/howto\_OS%2F2Druckeinrichtung and the page is just white, no menü .. nothing. Can you tell   
maggolo - (13:54): to get this document back ?  
sdumitriu - (13:55): Tomcat?  
plunden left #xwiki at 14:00  
maggolo - (14:04): Yes  
sdumitriu - (14:07): See http://tomcat.apache.org/security-6.html#Fixed%20in%20Apache%20Tomcat%206.0.10  
GillesSerasset joined #xwiki at 14:08  
GillesSerasset - (14:09): hi all,  
GillesSerasset - (14:09): svn.xwiki.org seems to be dead today ?  
sdumitriu - (14:09): Yes  
sdumitriu - (14:09): The server is down (hardware)  
sdumitriu - (14:10): Should be solved in a few hours  
GillesSerasset - (14:10): ok... I'm struggling to compile xwiki and debug one of the plugins...  
GillesSerasset - (14:11): to no avail untill now...  
GillesSerasset - (14:11): I'll come back with plenty of questions...  
kibahop left #xwiki at 14:11  
lucaa left at 14:15 (Quit: Leaving.  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 14:16  
maggolo - (14:16): sdumitriu: Ok thats a bug in tomcat 6 but i use tomcat 5.5.23.0, what can i do to get these links work or can i rewrite the links ? Or do i have to put these options in your link in tomcat5.conf or elswhere  
sdumitriu - (14:16): I think it applies to 5.5 also  
sdumitriu - (14:17): Actually, there are 2 things you can do  
sdumitriu - (14:17): 1. Configure Tomcat to let it work  
sdumitriu - (14:17): 2. Rename the page  
sdumitriu - (14:17): 2 would be simpler  
sdumitriu - (14:17): Which do you prefer?  
vmassol - (14:17): fyi I've modified the ecosystem panel on xwiki.org to add a link to the translation wiki  
maggolo - (14:19): sdumitriu: i prefer second  
maggolo - (14:20): sdumitriu: i tried to add ?xpage=rename&step=1 but this doesn't work  
sdumitriu - (14:21): K, then you'll need to edit another page, and write this:  
sdumitriu - (14:21): $xwiki.getDocument('IT.OS/Druckereinrichtung').renameDocument('IT.OSDruckereinrichtung')  
sdumitriu - (14:21): Replace with the correct names  
maggolo - (14:24): ok i have created a new page and now i'm in edit do i have to put this on the page or in the link?  
sdumitriu - (14:25): In the page  
maggolo - (14:26): ok now i see this text on the page and nothing happen, do i must have programming rights?  
sdumitriu - (14:27): Wait, what syntax is the page in?  
maggolo - (14:27): syntax 2.0  
sdumitriu - (14:28): If it's 2.0, then you must use it as:  
sdumitriu - (14:28): {{velocity}}  
sdumitriu - (14:28): $xwiki.getDocument...  
sdumitriu - (14:28): {{/velocity}}  
maggolo - (14:28): ok i changed to 1.0, now i get a white page is that correct?  
maggolo - (14:29): ok i think its correct no i get the page on this new link, and the renam is done too very nice  
maggolo - (14:29): thank you  
maggolo - (14:30): can i rename every page i want to change whit this code? I think yes, or?  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:31): sdumitriu: Did you see the grep command in the comment on XWIKI-2107?  
sdumitriu - (14:34): CalebJamesDeLisl: No  
sdumitriu - (14:35): BTW, it's not 2107  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:36): http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-4756?focusedCommentId=48267&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#action\_48267  
bbc581 joined #xwiki at 14:37  
sdumitriu - (14:37): Ah, must have missed it  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:37): Had to use 2 commands, do you know a way to say [thisWord|thatWord] ?  
sdumitriu - (14:38): (thisWord|thatWord)  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (14:38): Thanks.  
xenon75 joined #xwiki at 14:39  
vmassol - (14:56): tmortagne: ping skype  
tmortagne - (14:57): vmassol: WDYM ?  
vmassol - (14:57): I don't see you on skype  
vmassol - (14:58): (you appear offline)  
tmortagne - (14:58): well i'm on skype  
tmortagne - (14:58): let me restart it  
tmortagne - (14:58): indeed it seems stuck, not very stable this last beta version
